original_text: and will cut him in pieces and put him with the hypocrites. In that place there will be weeping and gnashing of teeth.
korean_text: 엄히 때리고 외식하는 자가 받는 벌에 처하리니 거기서 슬피 울며 이를 갈리라

sentences.original_text: and will cut him in pieces
and put him with the hypocrites
there will be weeping and gnashing of teeth
sentences.korean_translation: 통곡과 이를 갊는 일이 있을 것입니다
